item.title: Netflix ‘Spoiled 2025’ Ad Called Worst Commercial Ever On Social Media
item.description: Recently, Netflix aired a commercial that featured 35 spoilers for their shows and movies, called Netflix Spoiled 2025.

item.title: The ‘Stranger Things’ Series Finale Trailer Hints At 2 Different Character Deaths
item.description: The Stranger Things series finale is almost here, and the trailer might contain clues about who dies in the end.

item.title: Galaxy S26 Ultra Gets Bad News On Samsung's Breakthrough Satellite Voice Feature
item.description: Samsung Galaxy S26 will support satellite voice calls via Exynos Modem 5410, but the S26 Ultra's Snapdragon chip lacks this breakthrough feature.
